intro 1.text: Hey, how did you get in here--nevermind. Grab that weapon, can't you hear them coming?

intro 2.text: Christ sake just pick up that weapon over there

intro 3.text: Do you have a death wish?? I meant pick up the crowbar--wait, how are you still standing?

intro 5.text: Nevermind we have bigger problems. They'll breach the door soon, get ready to use that thing.

intro 6.text: Nice job, you saved both our asses.

intro 7.text: Look, you seem just as confused as I am. Let's go see the only person who can sort this out.

intro chest discovered.text: I'm curious--can you open that container over there?

intro chest opened.text: I don't know who you are, but no one has been able to open those containers for as long as I can remember.

intro chest opened 2.text: It wasn't easy for the rest of us. Go on, pick up that fancy artifact.
